cast.name: 杰瑞米·加德奈 Jeremy Gardner
凯特·麦克拉格奇 Kate MacCluggage

introduction: Domina-Sana is a faith-based pharmaceutical corporation whose treatment put an end to the "Dark Storm Age." The Dark Storm was an era where a sickness, unspeakably contagious, was unleashed throughout the globe, hideously disfiguring women who contracted it. This led to a commonly held belief that whoever fell ill with the sickness was in fact a witch. America, and many advanced nations like it, supported the murder of millions of women who were diseased.
